news.title: Society Quarterly Newsletter
news.excerpt: Publication of research summaries, policy updates, and opportunities for members to submit scholarly contributions.
news.content: Members: Free Subscription & Publication Priority | Non-Members: Subscription Available on Request

events.title: Society Webinar Series 2025
events.description: An exclusive series of expert-led virtual sessions addressing emerging trends, research, and innovations in poultry science.

events.title: PPS Poultry Science Summer Academy – Short Course
events.description: A condensed, skills-based two-track (Basic & Advanced) program designed to equip students and professionals with practical competencies in poultry health, genetics, nutrition, and management.

events.title: Hybrid Seminar – Career Counselling & Opportunities
events.description: Guidance from industry leaders and academics on career pathways, scholarships, and research collaborations in poultry sciences.
